name: andes thrummed mittens
notes:
andes thrummed knit mittens

get ready to cozy up in style! the andes thrummed knit mittens are part of the first fall 2025 cozy mitten make-along with marly bird — a free community event celebrating creativity, color, and comfort.

these mittens feature soft, fluffy thrums made from roving yarn, creating an insulating layer that feels like a hug for your hands. the rhythmic process of adding thrums is fun, fast, and totally addictive once you get started!

 what you’ll love:

classic mitten construction with a warm thrummed lining

bulky weight yarn for quick results and cozy texture

perfectly placed thrums that create that signature “cloud inside” feel

sizes for the whole family: child (small adult, medium adult, large adult)

 join the free make-along:
all free pattern instructions are available during the first fall 2025 cozy mitten make-along on marlybird.com:
 [https://marlybird.com/blog/first-fall-2025-cozy-mitten-make-along/][1]

✨ pattern upgrade available:
get the ad-free pdf with bonus materials, printable tags, extra hand warmer patterns, and full video tutorials inside the marly bird house.
 [https://marlybird.thrivecart.com/first-fall-2025-knitting/?ref=ravelry][2]

whether you’re new to thrumming or just love making warm winter accessories, the andes mittens are a must-stitch project for your fall lineup.

skill level: intermediate
yarn: bulky weight wool + roving (for thrums)
needles: us 8 [5 mm] double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge
